to Foster some aspect of real Community with the people in your

at my previous employer Amazon they're like hey what you know
what's the GitHub issue that I can go get involved in container D or you know can I just start creating PRS and yes

to the project join the slack Channel see who people are like find out kind of
what's happening in the project what's the pulse of the project and so you know
if you are a project and you're trying to attract and sort of velop a real Community I think having places that
feel tangible for a person to have personal connection so you know
obviously we're usually very very physically dispersed so you know slack
